item.title: Getting started with Gradle
item.description: In this tutorial, we’ll describe every step you need to take in order to have a working basic configuration on FrontLine. Once you connect to the instance provided by Gatling Corp, you’ll see this page. You need to signup with the Github account you provided Gatling Corp. There are multiple ways to create a Gatling artifact, which will be used by FrontLine to launch a run. You can use either a build tool (Maven, Sbt, Gradle) or the Gatling bundle.
